TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit NetMsmqBinding extends System.ServiceModel.MsmqBindingBase

summary.span: 表示适用于跨计算机通信的排队绑定。

span.span: Represents a queued binding that is suitable for cross-machine communication.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 绑定通过利用消息队列 (MSMQ) 作为传输来提供队列支持，并且为松耦合应用程序、故障隔离、负载均衡和断开连接的操作提供支持。The binding provides support for queuing by using Message Queuing (MSMQ) as a transport and enables support for loosely-coupled applications, failure isolation, load leveling and disconnected operations. 有关这些功能的讨论，请参阅[队列概述](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/queues-overview.md)。For a discussion of these features, see [Queues Overview](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/queues-overview.md). 这是通过 Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) 提供的系统提供绑定之一。This is one of the system-provided bindings provided by Windows Communication Foundation (WCF). 建议的过程是使用配置值定义绑定而不是使用基于代码的方法，除了必须将配置值设为已初始化的服务的某些高级方案之外。The recommended procedure is to define the binding using configuration values and not to use a code-based approach, except in certain advanced scenarios where configuration values must be set as a service is initialized. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何将服务配置为使用 绑定。The following example shows how to configure a service to use the binding. 首先演示的是配置文件。First, the configuration file. 接下来演示的是实际服务代码。Next, the actual service code. [!code-csharp[S_Msmq_Default#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_msmq_default/cs/service.cs#1)] [!code-vb[S_Msmq_Default#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_msmq_default/vb/service.vb#1)] [!code-csharp[S_Msmq_Default#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_msmq_default/cs/service.cs#2)] [!code-vb[S_Msmq_Default#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_msmq_default/vb/service.vb#2)] [!code-csharp[S_Msmq_Default#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_msmq_default/cs/hostapp.cs#10)] [!code-vb[S_Msmq_Default#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_msmq_default/vb/hostapp.vb#10)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingElementCollection CreateBindingElements() cil managed
Public Overrides Function CreateBindingElements () As BindingElementCollection

summary.span: 返回一个包含在当前绑定中的已排序的绑定元素集合。

span.span: Returns an ordered collection of binding elements contained in the current binding.

returns.span: 由 绑定描述的已排序的绑定元素集合。

span.span: The ordered collection of binding elements described by the binding.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 绑定元素的顺序很重要。The order of the binding elements is important. 它反映了构造和堆栈协议以及传输通道的顺序。It reflects the order in which the protocol and transport channels are constructed and stacked. 此绑定元素集合是一个新集合，可以对其进行修改并在之后用于创建 。This collection of binding elements is a new collection and can be modified and then used to create a . ## Examples 下面的代码将创建一个 `NetMsmqBinding` 并调用 `CreateBindingElements`，然后在 `BindingElements` 集合中输出每个绑定元素的名称。The following code creates a `NetMsmqBinding` and calls `CreateBindingElements`, and then prints out the name of each binding element in the `BindingElements` collection. [!code-csharp[S_UENetMsmqBinding#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_uenetmsmqbinding/cs/snippets.cs#3)]

The default value is SOAP 1.2.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property long MaxBufferPoolSize { long get(); void set(long value); };
member this.MaxBufferPoolSize : int64 with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置为从通道接收消息的消息缓冲区管理器分配并供其使用的最大内存量。

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum amount of memory that is allocated for use by the message buffer manager that receives messages from the channel.

value.span: 可供消息缓冲区管理器使用的最大内存量（以字节为单位）。

span.span: The maximum amount of memory, in bytes, available for use by the message buffer manager.
The default value is 524288 (0x80000) bytes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通过使用缓冲池， 将使用缓冲区的成本降至最低。The minimizes the cost of using buffers by using a buffer pool. 当消息离开通道时，服务需要使用缓冲区来处理这些消息。Buffers are required to process messages by the service when they come out of the channel. 如果缓冲池中的内存不足，无法处理消息负载，则 必须从 CLR 堆分配更多内存，而这会增加垃圾回收的系统开销。If there is not sufficient memory in the buffer pool to process the message load, the must allocate additional memory from the CLR heap, which increases the garbage collection overhead. 从 CLR 垃圾堆进行大量分配表明缓冲池太小，可以通过提高 限制来实现更大的内存分配，从而提高性能。Extensive allocation from the CLR garbage heap is an indication that the buffer pool size is too small and that performance can be improved with a larger allocation by increasing the limit. ## Examples 下面的代码演示如何设置 属性。The following code shows how to set the property. [!code-csharp[S_UENetMsmqBinding#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_uenetmsmqbinding/cs/snippets.cs#4)]

span.span: Gets or sets an enumeration value that indicates the queued communication channel transport that this binding uses.

value.span: 此绑定使用的队列管理器之间的传输。

span.span: The transport between queue managers that this binding uses.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 SOAP 可靠消息协议时，消息队列 (MSMQ) 不支持 Active Directory 寻址，因此当 设置为 时，不要将 设置为 或 `true`。Message Queuing (MSMQ) does not support Active Directory addressing when using SOAP Reliable Messaging Protocol, so do not set to or when is set to `true`. ## Examples 下面的代码演示如何设置 属性。The following code shows how to set the property. [!code-csharp[S_UENetMsmqBinding#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_uenetmsmqbinding/cs/snippets.cs#5)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象定义对 SOAP 消息复杂性的约束，此消息可由使用绑定配置的终结点处理。The object defines constraints on the complexity of SOAP messages that can be processed by endpoints configured with a binding. 这些约束包括 `maxArrayLength`、`maxBytesPerRead`、`maxDepth`、`maxNameTableCharCount` 和 `maxStringContentLength`。These constraints include `maxArrayLength`, `maxBytesPerRead`, `maxDepth`, `maxNameTableCharCount`, and `maxStringContentLength`. 这些值有助于防止遭受拒绝服务攻击。These values aid in the prevention of denial of service attacks. 有关详情，请参阅。For more information, see . ## Examples 下面的代码演示如何设置 属性。The following code shows how to set the property. [!code-csharp[S_UENetMsmqBinding#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_uenetmsmqbinding/cs/snippets.cs#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是消息队列 (MSMQ) 传输和 SOAP 安全的包装。 is an encapsulation of both Message Queuing (MSMQ) transport and SOAP security. 它指定是否启用传输或 SOAP 安全；如果启用，还指定所使用的身份验证模式和保护级别。It specifies whether transport or SOAP security is enabled and, if so, what authentication mode and protection levels are in use. ## Examples 下面的代码演示如何获取 对象。The following code shows how to get the object. MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool UseActiveDirectory { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.UseActiveDirectory : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否应该使用 Active Directory 来转换队列地址。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether queue addresses should be converted using Active Directory.

value.span: 如果应该使用 Active Directory 转换队列地址，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if queue addresses should be converted using Active Directory; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 消息队列 (MSMQ) 队列地址可由路径名或直接格式名组成。The Message Queuing (MSMQ) queue addresses can consist of path names or direct format names. 包含直接格式名时，消息队列可使用 DNS、NetBIOS 或 IP 解析队列名称。With a direct format name, Message Queuing resolves the queue name using DNS, NetBIOS or IP. 包含路径名时，消息队列可使用 Active Directory 解析队列名称。With a path name, Message Queuing resolves the queue name using Active Directory. 默认情况下，Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) 排队传输将转换为直接格式名消息队列的 URI。By default, the Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) queued transport converts the URI of a message queue to a direct format name. 通过将 属性设置为 `true`，应用程序可以指定排队传输应使用 Active Directory 而不是 DNS、NetBIOS 或 IP 来解析队列名。By setting the property to `true`, an application can specify that the queued transport should resolve the queue name using Active Directory rather than DNS, NetBIOS, or IP. ## Examples 下面的代码演示如何设置 属性。The following code shows how to set the property. [!code-csharp[S_UENetMsmqBinding#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_uenetmsmqbinding/cs/snippets.cs#6)]
